title: The.Lord.of.the.Rings.Conquest.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
The.Lord.of.the.Rings.Conquest.Repack-R.G.Mechanics


Year: 2009
Genre: Action / 3D / 3rd Person
Publication Type: RePack
Language: Eng  | Rus
Language: Eng | Rus
Crack: Razor1911

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP (SP2), Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: 2.4 GHz or faster; Intel Core 2 Duo or faster
Memory: 2 GB
Video: 256 MB compatible with Shader third model
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 6.2 GB

Description:

Legendary fantasy saga "The Lord of the Rings" to the next level 
of development in the world of electronic entertainment. You have 
a unique opportunity to participate in grand battles in the picturesque 
open spaces of Middle-earth. And it does not necessarily favor the 
good ... you can join the ranks of the armies of evil, taking over 
management of the cave troll, Olyphant, Balrog and Sauron himself!
The game was created by real professionals from the studio Pandemic, 
responsible for the brilliant dilogy Star Wars: Battlefront. Offering 
exciting battles, where each participant chooses a character and 
tactics to taste. Razite enemies dwarf ax, push them a crushing 
strength of siege catapults, and strew the elven arrows, stunning 
magic - Tolkien Middle-earth in The Lord of the Rings: Conquest 
reproduced in minute detail. The great battle described in the book 
and featured in the legendary film come alive on screen, and you 
become their direct party!

Features:

Team spirit. 

Lord of the Rings: Conquest - an uncompromising 
battle for power over Middle-earth. Each battle is a clash between 
two teams where each member plays a unique role

Historical accuracy. 

The game has recreated the most vivid scenes of the novel. 
You will be able to contribute to the landmark battle, described 
in the book, and try yourself as familiar heroes.

Beyond good. 

The choice presented several classes of characters belonging to 
the "good" or "evil" camp. Not only can you defend Middle-earth, 
but to conquer it on the side of Sauron!

The massive battle. 

In online battles can participate up to 16 players, and in the 
split-screen co-operate or compete can simultaneously four
A close relationship with the film. Game contains material 
from the film saga, including the unforgettable music

Features repack

The Lord of the Rings: Conquest
Version of the game - v1.1
Do not cut / recoded
